name: Polystrike
description:
I mainly update the game and do devlogs on GameJolt. This is for those who prefer Itch.io :P

Pretty early in development. First build was released only 3 days into the project!

Polystrike is my first multiplayer unity project! It's also written in C#, unlike my other projects which were done in JavaScript. shudders

Formerly known as Blocky FPS, Polystrike is your typical shooter, minus the realistic people, the blood, and the bodies. Designed for those with strict parents but still want to enjoy the fun of a regular shooter.

Join us on Discord! https://discord.gg/YQECbDs
